question:
You have been doing some voluntary work to help your local community. However, now you are unable to continue doing this work.
Write a letter to the manager of the organisation where you have been working. In your letter
-Describe the work you have been doing
-Explain why you can no longer do this work
-Recommend another person who is interested in the work
text: I am writing to inform you that I will be unable to continue my unpaid duties for you any longer due to immigration issues.

About my duties, my work was related to entering regular transactions into the system and collecting relevant paperwork from other volunteers and officials. In addition, I was also taking care of some of the administrative tasks, which were mostly connected with your organisation’s human resources.

About my incapability, I was living in your country with a student visa, and my visa has run out in the meantime. Therefore, the immigration authority wants me to return to my home country. Besides visa restriction, my university education was completed last January.
My junior colleague, who is from Spain, is also interested in gaining experience, and can assist you if you are interested or I can advertise volunteer opportunities for you at my university campus.
